name: Vegan Cream Cheese Pound Cake
description: Vegan Cream Cheese Pound Cake. Marbled Vanilla Chocolate Cake. This pound cake is moist, dense and great to-go dessert slice. Dairy-free Eggless Vegan Recipe. Makes 1 8.5 by 4.5 loaf pan
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup vegan cream cheese.  (or you can use silken tofu + 1 tsp lime juice or cashew cream)
2 tbsp thick cashew cream or coconut cream or non dairy yogurt (I use non dairy yogurt)
2/3 cup sugar (1 tbsp more for sweeter)
2 cups flour (I use 1 cup Spelt + 1 cup unbleached white(ap flour))

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender blend all the wet ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender blend all the wet ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients until well combined. Add the blended wet ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients until well combined. Add the blended wet ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix until well combined. The batter will be thick. Divide the batter into 2 bowls. in one bowl add cocoa powder plus 2 tbsp non dairy milk.mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix until well combined. The batter will be thick. Divide the batter into 2 bowls. in one bowl add cocoa powder plus 2 tbsp non dairy milk.mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the plain batter into parchment lined loaf. Even it out. Then drop the chocolate batter and even it out.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the plain batter into parchment lined loaf. Even it out. Then drop the chocolate batter and even it out.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 50 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick from near the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 50 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick from near the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 5 to 10 minutes. Then remove from the pan and let it sit on the cooling rack to cool completely. Slice and serve or store.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 5 to 10 minutes. Then remove from the pan and let it sit on the cooling rack to cool completely. Slice and serve or store.

recipeInstructions.text: Store covered on the counter for the day, or refrigerate in a airtight container for upto 4 days. Warm and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Store covered on the counter for the day, or refrigerate in a airtight container for upto 4 days. Warm and serve.
